topic.title: Creating topic
topic.body:
Also works!

Feel free to delete it later if you want.

1513690953_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2.body:
> [voiceofthewind](#comment_1_1HGgW5HbNRcxUAVbAYXARrPL4MgPvUCM9e): Hi gitcenter. Thanks for all your help with this.  [...]

You are admin, right? Then, after hovering topic text `Also works!` you will notice a grey pencil. Press it and you'll see three buttons in the bottom of the page. One of them is `Delete Topic`.

> [voiceofthewind](#comment_1_1HGgW5HbNRcxUAVbAYXARrPL4MgPvUCM9e): Hi gitcenter. Thanks for all your help with this.  [...]

Also, feel free to ask me for help whenever on ZeroMe or ZeroMail.

Some docs for ZeroNet: zeronet.readthedocs.io

> [voiceofthewind](#comment_3_1HGgW5HbNRcxUAVbAYXARrPL4MgPvUCM9e): Thanks for the offer to help. I am set as admin in content.json, but I only get the pencil on my own topics for some reason. [...]

You also need to check `This is my site` in sidebar (and sign `content.json` afterwards).
